text: Pedro Manuel Mamede Passos Coelho (; born 24 July 1964) is a Portuguese politician and university teacher. He was the 118th Prime Minister of Portugal, in office from 2011 to 2015. He was the leader of the Social Democratic Party (PSD) between 2010 and 2018.EU austerity drive country by country, BBC (21 May 2012)The Federal Government Now Employs the Fewest People Since 1966Why this obsession with cutting public service jobs? ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Portugal Category:People from Coimbra
title: Pedro Passos Coelho
